plot outline: Veerasamy (T. Rajendar) is a lawyer party leader and Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) in Chennai. His party has 13 MLAs and is in support to the sitting government (126/234). He tries to do good things to people. His sister falls in love with a pimp's brother, and a neighbor Sarasu (Mumtaj) falls in love with Veerasamy. Veerasamy then has to handle family conflicts as well as working to win the local elections. Due to some false witness, Veerasamy is found guilty of involvement in corruption. On hearing this, he dies of a heart attack. When he dies, Sarasu also drops dead.
title: Veerasamy
plot: _Veerasamy_ (qv) (T. Rajendar) is a lawyer party leader and Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) in Chennai. His party has 13 MLAs and is in support to the sitting government (126/234). He tries to do good things to people. His sister falls in love with a pimp's brother, and a neighbor Sarasu (Mumtaj) falls in love with _Veerasamy_ (qv). _Veerasamy_ (qv) then has to handle family conflicts as well as working to win the local elections. Due to some false witness, _Veerasamy_ (qv) is found guilty of involvement in corruption. On hearing this, he dies of a heart attack. When he dies, Sarasu also drops dead.
